title: Found a scam to get your password

replies.body:
Hi summoner, 

**Please don't post any links here**, as other players might click on the links (even if they obvious scams)

>Any promotions or events ran will be announced and confirmed by Riot and will be hosted on one of the following domains:

>www.riotgames.com
www.leagueoflegends.com
www.lolesports.com

If you do encounter a scam and your account becomes compromised, please go through and change all your passwords and verify your email [HERE](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect).

You can read more about keeping your account safe [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)

There is even a fun little infographic about account safety [HERE](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/account-security-education/?utm_source=eune_en&utm_medium=fpcard&utm_campaign=ase). 

Stay safe ♥
